channel.title: 667 Tutorial's for starters
channel.description:
[size=20pt]For more tutorials [Advanced] :] click on this link.. [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,540811.0.html]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,540811.0.html[/url][/size] [b][size=15pt]So this is my second tutorial list to help starter's get there 667 going and editing the basic's[/size][/b] Since i have seen this so many times im going to give in and show people how to set up the 667 to run it... -.- First step is to install jdk7 and jre7 you can find the links here... [url=http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/java/javase/downloads/index.html]http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/java/javase/downloads/index.html[/url] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/2401747/jdk_and_jre7.png[/img] Note: as i said above download both JDK7 and JRE7 the next step is downloading the source + client + cache.. [b]If you haven't made a new folder and put the cache in it make sure you do by going to the source folder then data folder right click new folder name it "cache" and extract your cache into it[/b] now to edit the run and compiler.bat files to your needs... for a 32bit computer your compiler should look something like this.. [code]@echo off title Compiler echo starting... "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_03/bin/javac.exe" -d bin -cp lib/*; -sourcepath src src/com/rs/*.java src/com/rs/cache/*.java src/com/rs/cache/loaders/*.java src/com/rs/cores/*.java src/com/rs/game/*.java src/com/rs/game/item/*.java src/com/rs/game/minigames/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/combat/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/combat/impl/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/corp/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/dragons/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/dungeonnering/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/familiar/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/godwars/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/godwars/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/godwars/bandos/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/godwars/barrows/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/godwars/saradomin/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/godwars/zammorak/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/godwars/zaros/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/kalph/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/others/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/slayer/*.java src/com/rs/game/player/*.java src/com/rs/game/player/actions/*.java src/com/rs/game/player/content/*.java src/com/rs/game/player/content/dungeoneering/*.java src/com/rs/game/player/content/dungeoneering/rooms/*.java src/com/rs/game/player/controlers/*.java src/com/rs/game/player/cutscenes/*.java src/com/rs/game/player/cutscenes/actions/*.java src/com/rs/game/player/dialogues/*.java src/com/rs/game/tasks/*.java src/com/rs/*.java src/com/rs/io/*.java src/com/rs/net/*.java src/com/rs/net/decoders/*.java src/com/rs/net/decoders/handlers/*.java src/com/rs/net/encoders/*.java src/com/rs/tools/*.java src/com/rs/utils/*.java src/com/rs/utils/huffman/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/godwars/armadyl/*.java pause[/code] and the run.bat should look something like this... [code]@echo off title run echo starting... "C:/Program Files /Java/jre7/bin/java.exe" -Xmx512m -cp bin;lib/*; com.rs.Launcher true true false pause[/code] now for a 64bit computer.. compiler again.. [code]@echo off title Compiler echo starting... "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.7.0_03/bin/javac.exe" -d bin -cp lib/*; -sourcepath src src/com/rs/*.java src/com/rs/cache/*.java src/com/rs/cache/loaders/*.java src/com/rs/cores/*.java src/com/rs/game/*.java src/com/rs/game/item/*.java src/com/rs/game/minigames/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/combat/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/combat/impl/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/corp/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/dragons/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/dungeonnering/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/familiar/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/godwars/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/godwars/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/godwars/bandos/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/godwars/barrows/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/godwars/saradomin/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/godwars/zammorak/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/godwars/zaros/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/kalph/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/others/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/slayer/*.java src/com/rs/game/player/*.java src/com/rs/game/player/actions/*.java src/com/rs/game/player/content/*.java src/com/rs/game/player/content/dungeoneering/*.java src/com/rs/game/player/content/dungeoneering/rooms/*.java src/com/rs/game/player/controlers/*.java src/com/rs/game/player/cutscenes/*.java src/com/rs/game/player/cutscenes/actions/*.java src/com/rs/game/player/dialogues/*.java src/com/rs/game/tasks/*.java src/com/rs/*.java src/com/rs/io/*.java src/com/rs/net/*.java src/com/rs/net/decoders/*.java src/com/rs/net/decoders/handlers/*.java src/com/rs/net/encoders/*.java src/com/rs/tools/*.java src/com/rs/utils/*.java src/com/rs/utils/huffman/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/godwars/armadyl/*.java pause[/code] and the run should look like this... [code]@echo off title run echo starting... "C:/Program Files (x86)/Java/jre7/bin/java.exe" -Xmx512m -cp bin;lib/*; com.rs.Launcher true true false pause[/code] all done :] ======================================================================= [b][size=15pt]Next tutorial is changing server name!@#!$#[/size][/b] Go to the source folder then [b]src/com/rs[/b] and open up settings.java then search for this code... [code=java] public static final String SERVER_NAME = "Server Name";[/code] and change it to what ever save and compile.. ======================================================================= [b][size=15pt]This tutorial is how to make more admins/mods...[/size][/b] Go to source folder then.. [b]src/com/rs/game/player[/b] open up player.java and search for this code [code=java] public void init(Session session, String username, int displayMode, int screenWidth, int screenHeight) {[/code] near the bottom of the method before the last two "}}" you might see something like this code.. [code=java] if (username.equalsIgnoreCase("Username")) { rights = 2;[/code] to add more people to the code you will have to change it to this.. [code=java] if (username.equalsIgnoreCase("username") || username.equalsIgnoreCase("username2") || username.equalsIgnoreCase("username3") || username.equalsIgnoreCase("username4")) { rights = 2;//Admin[/code] and to add mods copy the code and change the player rights to "1" like so... [code=java] if (username.equalsIgnoreCase("Username") || username.equalsIgnoreCase("username2") || username.equalsIgnoreCase("username3") || username.equalsIgnoreCase("username4")) { rights = 1;//Moderator[/code] save and compile... ======================================================================== [b][size=15pt]Okay this is the 667 drop editor you need to edit some code to get it to work properly i will not help you with this as it is a simple fix..[/size][/b] Download these file's here: [url=http://www.upload.ee/files/2332928/Drop.java.html = Drop.java]http://www.upload.ee/files/2332928/Drop.java.html = Drop.java[/url] [url=http://www.upload.ee/files/2332935/dropEditor.java.html = dropEditor.java]http://www.upload.ee/files/2332935/dropEditor.java.html = dropEditor.java[/url] [url=http://www.upload.ee/files/2332940/i...ions.java.html =itemDefinitions.java]http://www.upload.ee/files/2332940/i...ions.java.html =itemDefinitions.java[/url] http://www.upload.ee/files/2332945/NPC.java.html = NPC.java[/url] [url=http://www.upload.ee/files/2332947/NPCDrops.java.html = NPCDrops.java]http://www.upload.ee/files/2332947/NPCDrops.java.html = NPCDrops.java[/url] File Locations on where to add these or edit the .java file's: *Drop.java location = com/rs/game/npc *dropEditor.java = com/rs/tools *itemDefinitions.java = com/rs/cache/loaders *NPC.java = com/rs/game/npc *NPCDrops.java = com/rs/utils Drop Editor Mirror links: [url=http://uppit.com/o2sltv8ks0u9/Drop.java]http://uppit.com/o2sltv8ks0u9/Drop.java[/url] [url=http://uppit.com/yv9v1j2wibk2/dropEditor.java]http://uppit.com/yv9v1j2wibk2/dropEditor.java[/url] [url=http://uppit.com/ipbtb3ga4kb3/itemDefinitions.java]http://uppit.com/ipbtb3ga4kb3/itemDefinitions.java[/url] [url=http://uppit.com/55a4f9uoj6xd/NPC.java]http://uppit.com/55a4f9uoj6xd/NPC.java[/url] [url=http://uppit.com/cc4inq8wlhrp/NPCDrops.java]http://uppit.com/cc4inq8wlhrp/NPCDrops.java[/url] Credits: ultikiller20 This is pretty much spoon feeding I will not help you use this or fix the error's so good luck :] ... save compile remember to fix the error ;) =======================================================================[b][size=15pt]WebClient or desktop code[/size][/b] The title could be a bit confusing so here is a pitcher of what im showing you.. [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/2401751/webclient_or_desktop.png[/img] so u click on game mode pick either webclient or desktop and it will redirect you to either one and start downloading... so on your website make a new age call it what ever you want and add a html code not a text box and put this in... [code=html4strict]Code (HTML): [Select]






[/code] so put here i have left the spaces site here, logo here, webclient link here, desktop link here and save your done publish ur site and u have a working game mode :] Credits: Me :D for help just leave a message and will get back to you as soon as i can need more tutorials on getting started leave a message.
